Class FullFilePanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container

                  edu.jhu.cs.oose.biblio.gui.FullFilePanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.event.ChangeListener, javax.swing.Scrollable
Direct Known Subclasses:
EpubFullFilePanel, PDFFullFilePanel
public abstract class FullFilePanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements javax.swing.event.ChangeListener, javax.swing.Scrollable

Displays the entire file, not including scrollbars, etc needed to view the whole file depending what type of file it is.

See Also:
Serialized Form

viewport

private javax.swing.JViewport viewport
The viewport containing this panel. We need access to this in order to find out which part of ourself to draw.
